audioText: Le lendemain, primo nous boirons du courant électrique dans cet avion.
question: When will we drink electric current in this airplane?
options: The next day, first we will drink
Yesterday evening before the flight departure
During the meal service on the airplane
After landing at the destination airport
explanation: The text states 'Le lendemain, primo nous boirons du courant électrique dans cet avion' - The next day, first we will drink electric current in this airplane. 'Boirons' is the correct first person plural future tense of 'boire' (to drink).
